biotools.summary: Mitochondrial mixture database and interpretation tool (MMDIT) is an open-source, interactive software for the probabilistic genotyping of mitochondrial DNA mixtures based on complete mitochondrial genomes (mtGenomes). MMDIT can perform both 'Mixture Deconvolution' and 'Mixture Analysis'.

bioschemas.name: MMDIT
